meanings.definition: Length or extent of film or video material
meanings.sent1: The footage of the movie was very long.
meanings.sent2: She watched the footage of the concert multiple times.
meanings.sent3: The footage of the cat playing with a toy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The footage of the storm raging outside was like a wild dance.
meanings.sent5: The vivid footage of the waterfall left a lasting impression.
